# a supporter of {{w|Gilbert du Motier de La Fayette|La Fayette|lang=fr}} during the French Revolution
types.html:
fayettiste m or f by sense (plural fayettistes)

  1. a supporter of La Fayette during the French Revolution
trans: a supporter of La Fayette during the French Revolution
